In 2008, AEGON’s share price was severely affected by the global financial crisis. During the year, AEGON’s share on the Amsterdam stock exchange lost 62.6% of its value (65.5% in US dollar terms). The graphs on this page 20 show the performance of AEGON shares on the Amsterdam and New York stock exchanges during 2008, compared with the AEX and the DJ Stoxx 600 Insurance indices.
